originalText.text: I recommend Alexander Shapiro for anyone, that has a work accident. Throughout my years when I was dealing with the accident, Alexander was with me all the way. It’s tough in the beginning when you have a serious head injury, but Alexander was with me all the way and that I do appreciate it! At the end he won millions for me and I am able to support my family and care for myself! Thank you Alex

originalText.text: Alexander and his entire office are just amazing. Alex took on my case and guided me in the right direction. Alex wears multiple hats he’s a lawyer, doctor, friend, therapist, counselor, etc he’ll guide you from the law part to helping you understand even the language the doctors speak. I highly recommend Alex and his team to anyone out there looking for a lawyer. By the time your case is done they’ll be family

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience with this law firm. The team is incredibly knowledgeable, displaying a high level of professionalism in every aspect. Their responsiveness and attention to detail truly set them apart. I would wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone seeking an experienced attorney.
